title: Didnt receive my Ward Skin that i got from a chest, after i crafted it!!!
body:
Got a key and a chest, i opened en crafted the Ward Skin "Rising Down"
But after crafting i got 0 / like no ward! 
It stands in my purchases but than with amount 0.....!!!!

Does anyone else have this problem?

I WANT MY WARD SKIN :(

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}         {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}         {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Heya 6 Impora6Kayla 6 - 

Thanks for the report! 

For something like this, please shoot a ticket over to [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to take a look at your account and make any adjustments - in this case, it looks like granting the Rising Dawn ward.

**EDIT:** Looks like the ward was granted, and it is in your store inventory. Would you mind taking another look and letting me know if it's there? Thanks! :D 

Also, 0 amount in the store purchase history is how all items from Hextech Crafting look until store fixes it. (So this is a bug on its own.)
